# Windows 默认字体

主要用于系统字体修复，以注册表运行即可

```
Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\.DEFAULT\Control Panel\Desktop\WindowMetrics]
"BorderWidth"="-15"
"CaptionFont"=hex:f4,ff,ff,ff,00,00,00,00,00,00,00,00,00,00,00,00,90,01,00,00,\
```
